articles.title: Trapped woman pulled to safety from flooded car
articles.description: Flash floodwaters in Arizona surround a woman's car after its tyres got stuck in mud.
articles.content:
Police bodycam footage shows a woman's dramatic rescue from a car surrounded by flash flooding in Arizona. 
It took place on Thursday after heavy rain pounded Arizona earlier last week.
